name: Astray (itch) (Selina Geboers)
description:
Welcome to Astray, A VR narrative game developed for the oculus quest 2.

One day you wake up, with a strange feeling of deja vu and a headache. As you investigate what exactly is going on you realise something is wrong and not just with the world.

Will you be able to discover what is happening and can you overcome this?

Credit
